title: Ep. 154 S&A Investor - The Case for Buying Silver
itunes:title: The Case for Buying Silver
description: Bradford Cooke, CEO of Endeavor Silver, tells us why silver prices could skyrocket from here. Bradford also talks about his company's latest acquisition and why it's a great opportunity to buy his stock at current levels.
